35
36#define RETERR(x) do { \
37 isc_result_t _r = (x); \
38 if (_r != ISC_R_SUCCESS) \
39 return (_r); \
40 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
41
42
43static isc_result_t bind_ttl(isc_textregion_t *source, uint32_t *ttl);
44
45/*
46 * Helper for dns_ttl_totext().
47 */
48static isc_result_t
49ttlfmt(unsigned int t, const char *s, bool verbose,
50 bool space, isc_buffer_t *target)
51{
52 char tmp[60];
53 unsigned int len;
54 isc_region_t region;
55
56 if (verbose)
57 len = snprintf(tmp, sizeof(tmp), "%s%u %s%s",
58 space ? " " : "",
59 t, s,
60 t == 1 ? "" : "s");
61 else
62 len = snprintf(tmp, sizeof(tmp), "%u%c", t, s[0]);
63
64 INSIST(len + 1 <= sizeof(tmp));
65 isc_buffer_availableregion(target, &region);
66 if (len > region.length)
67 return (ISC_R_NOSPACE);
68 memmove(region.base, tmp, len);
69 isc_buffer_add(target, len);
70
71 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
72}
73
74/*
75 * Derived from bind8 ns_format_ttl().
76 */
77isc_result_t
78dns_ttl_totext(uint32_t src, bool verbose,
79 bool upcase, isc_buffer_t *target)
80{
81 unsigned secs, mins, hours, days, weeks, x;
82
83 secs = src % 60; src /= 60;
84 mins = src % 60; src /= 60;
85 hours = src % 24; src /= 24;
86 days = src % 7; src /= 7;
87 weeks = src; src = 0;
88 POST(src);
89
90 x = 0;
91 if (weeks != 0) {
92 RETERR(ttlfmt(weeks, "week", verbose, (x > 0), target));
93 x++;
94 }
95 if (days != 0) {
96 RETERR(ttlfmt(days, "day", verbose, (x > 0), target));
97 x++;
98 }
99 if (hours != 0) {
100 RETERR(ttlfmt(hours, "hour", verbose, (x > 0), target));
101 x++;
102 }
103 if (mins != 0) {
104 RETERR(ttlfmt(mins, "minute", verbose, (x > 0), target));
105 x++;
106 }
107 if (secs != 0 ||
108 (weeks == 0 && days == 0 && hours == 0 && mins == 0)) {
109 RETERR(ttlfmt(secs, "second", verbose, (x > 0), target));
110 x++;
111 }
112 INSIST (x > 0);
113 /*
114 * If only a single unit letter is printed, print it
115 * in upper case. (Why? Because BIND 8 does that.
116 * Presumably it has a reason.)
117 */
118 if (x == 1 && upcase && !verbose) {
119 isc_region_t region;
120 /*
121 * The unit letter is the last character in the
122 * used region of the buffer.
123 *
124 * toupper() does not need its argument to be masked of cast
125 * here because region.base is type unsigned char *.
126 */
127 isc_buffer_usedregion(target, &region);
128 region.base[region.length - 1] =
129 toupper(region.base[region.length - 1]);
130 }
131 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
132}
133
134isc_result_t
135dns_counter_fromtext(isc_textregion_t *source, uint32_t *ttl) {
136 return (bind_ttl(source, ttl));
137}
138
139isc_result_t
140dns_ttl_fromtext(isc_textregion_t *source, uint32_t *ttl) {
141 isc_result_t result;
142
143 result = bind_ttl(source, ttl);
144 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS && result != ISC_R_RANGE)
145 result = DNS_R_BADTTL;
146 return (result);
147}
148
149static isc_result_t
150bind_ttl(isc_textregion_t *source, uint32_t *ttl) {
151 uint64_t tmp = 0ULL;
152 uint32_t n;
153 char *s;
154 char buf[64];
155 char nbuf[64]; /* Number buffer */
156
157 /*
158 * Copy the buffer as it may not be NULL terminated.
159 * No legal counter / ttl is longer that 63 characters.
160 */
161 if (source->length > sizeof(buf) - 1)
162 return (DNS_R_SYNTAX);
163 /* Copy source->length bytes and NUL terminate. */
164 snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "%.*s", (int)source->length, source->base);
165 s = buf;
166
167 do {
168 isc_result_t result;
169
170 char *np = nbuf;
171 while (*s != '\0' && isdigit((unsigned char)*s))
172 *np++ = *s++;
173 *np++ = '\0';
174 INSIST(np - nbuf <= (int)sizeof(nbuf));
175 result = isc_parse_uint32(&n, nbuf, 10);
176 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
177 return (DNS_R_SYNTAX);
178 switch (*s) {
179 case 'w':
180 case 'W':
181 tmp += (uint64_t) n * 7 * 24 * 3600;
182 s++;
183 break;
184 case 'd':
185 case 'D':
186 tmp += (uint64_t) n * 24 * 3600;
187 s++;
188 break;
189 case 'h':
190 case 'H':
191 tmp += (uint64_t) n * 3600;
192 s++;
193 break;
194 case 'm':
195 case 'M':
196 tmp += (uint64_t) n * 60;
197 s++;
198 break;
199 case 's':
200 case 'S':
201 tmp += (uint64_t) n;
202 s++;
203 break;
204 case '\0':
205 /* Plain number? */
206 if (tmp != 0ULL)
207 return (DNS_R_SYNTAX);
208 tmp = n;
209 break;
210 default:
211 return (DNS_R_SYNTAX);
212 }
213 } while (*s != '\0');
214
215 if (tmp > 0xffffffffULL)
216 return (ISC_R_RANGE);
217
218 *ttl = (uint32_t)(tmp & 0xffffffffUL);
219 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
220}
